subsection.name: Overview
subsection.p: Encryptors are supported via the GordianEncryptorFactory interface.
Algorithms are represented by GordianEncryptorSpec. A GordianEncryptor is obtained via the encryptorSpec, and then messages are encrypted/decrypted by the encryptor.

subsection.name: Sample
Composite Encryptors
subsection.p: Composite encryptions may be created by a composite keyPair, as long as each element of the composite keyPair is assigned a valid encryptorSpec.
